title: Peanut butter squares
description: I was recipe testing some millionaire’s shortbread and found I did not have enough of the correct ingredients. A family-sized pot of crunchy peanut butter sat almost full at the back of my cupboard, providing me with some nutty inspiration for these peanut butter squares.
ingredients: 200g/7oz dark chocolate (at least 60% cocoa solids) or milk chocolate (or a mixture of both)
